title: WTTF: T206 HOFers with backs I need
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTTF: T206 HOFers with backs I need
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
First, I'm looking to trade this T206 Bresnahan (batting) w/POLAR BEAR back SGC 40 for another HOFer (I don't have) with a Polar Bear back.  Straight up trade, or trade/cash combo if you have a better HOFer. I have another Bresnahan (batting) with a different back so this one has to go.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/T206%20Back%20Set/1909-11T-206BresnahanRogerwithbatPO.jpg[/IMG]

Second, I'm looking for any of these three HOFers in one of the backs listed below (the list below contains the backs I need for my back set.  The Sweet Caps, Piedmonts, Sovereigns, and Old Mill should be relatively easy for the following three HOFers):

1) T-206 Walter Johnson (portrait)
2) T-206 Christy Mathewson (portrait)
3) T-206 Ty Cobb (red portrait) *****OWN*****

Or I'm looking to acquire any HOFer with a tougher back (Red Hindu or Blank back)


9. Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
11. Blank Back
17. American Beauty - Series 460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
18. Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
21. American Beauty (no Frame) - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
22. American Beauty (with Frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
23. Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
25. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
26. Old Mill (Black) - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
30. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
31. Sovereign - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
33. Sweet Caporal - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
35. Piedmont - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
37. Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
38. Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA

For TRADE: T-206 Demmitt (St. Louis), T214 Kelley Victory Tobacco
